ModMetaData.name: More Happiness Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds more happiness genes. To be more specific, adds genes that have mood effects of -20, -15, -7, -3, -1, 15, and 20.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreHappinessGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
